properties.name: Petronas Twin Towers
properties.description: Iconic 452m twin skyscrapers connected by the world's highest two-story bridge

properties.name: Langkawi Sky Bridge
properties.description: Curved pedestrian bridge offering panoramic views of the Andaman Sea

properties.name: George Town (Penang)
properties.description: UNESCO heritage city famous for street art, temples, and Southeast Asia's best street food

properties.name: Cameron Highlands
properties.description: Cool hill station with rolling tea plantations and mossy forests

properties.name: Batu Caves
properties.description: Limestone cave temples with 42.7m Lord Murugan statue and 272 colorful steps

properties.name: Mount Kinabalu
properties.description: Southeast Asia's highest peak in Sabah, Borneo with diverse ecosystems

properties.name: Sipadan Island
properties.description: World-renowned diving destination off Sabah with exceptional marine biodiversity

properties.name: Malacca Historic City
properties.description: UNESCO heritage port city with Portuguese, Dutch, and British colonial influences
